text: International Hardcore Superstar is the sixth studio album by Danny Diablo. It was released on October 6, 2009, via Tim Armstrong's Hellcat Records. The record is the follow-up to his 2007 album Thugcore 4 Life. ==Track listing== == Samples == *"Sex And Violence" contains samples of The Exploited's song "Sex & Violence" from their 1981 album Punks Not Dead == Personnel == *Dan Singer - main performer, producer *Erik Schrody - performer *Jack Gonzalez - performer *Natasha Nicholson - additional vocals *Richard Alfaro - performer *Tim Armstrong - producer, performer *Toby Morse - additional vocals *Vincenzo Luvineri - performer *Big Left, Ceekay Jones, Prince Metropolitan - guest performers == References == Category:2010 albums Category:Danny Diablo albums Category:Epitaph Records albums Category:Hellcat Records albums
title: International Hardcore Superstar
